<style type="text/css">
/* maurices cta-master v2.0.2 060420 pz */
.maurCTAbox{width:auto;margin:0 auto;padding:0;pointer-events:none;position:absolute;text-align:center;white-space:nowrap;box-sizing:border-box}.maurCTAbox *,.maurCTAbox :after,.maurCTAbox :before{box-sizing:inherit}.maurCTAbox *{line-height:normal;letter-spacing:normal}.maurCTAbox>a{font-size:0}.maurCTAbox.center,.maurCTAbox.center_m{top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.maurCTAbox.center_h,.maurCTAbox.center_h_m{left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,0)}.maurCTAbox.center_v,.maurCTAbox.center_v_m{top:50%;transform:translate(0,-50%)}.maurCTA{margin:0;padding:1vw 4vw;font-family:HelveticaNeueW01-55Roma;font-size:4vw;text-transform:uppercase;cursor:pointer;white-space:nowrap;pointer-events:auto;position:relative;color:#000;border:1px solid}.maurCTAbox :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA{margin-top:8%}.maurCTAbox.inline .maurCTA,.maurCTAbox.inline_m .maurCTA{margin-top:0;display:inline-block}.maurCTAbox.inline :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA:not(.underline),.maurCTAbox.inline_m :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA:not(.underline){margin-left:1em}.maurCTA.fill{color:#000;background:#fff;border-color:#fff;text-shadow:none}.maurCTA.shadow{text-shadow:0 0 5px #000,0 0 20px #000;box-shadow:inset 0 0 5px #000,0 0 5px #000}.maurCTA.glow{text-shadow:0 0 5px #fff,0 0 20px #fff;box-shadow:inset 0 0 5px #fff,0 0 5px #fff}.maurCTA.fill.shadow{text-shadow:none;box-shadow:0 0 5px #000}.maurCTA.fill.glow{text-shadow:none;box-shadow:0 0 5px #fff}.maurCTA.underline.shadow{text-shadow:0 0 5px #000;box-shadow:none}.maurCTA.underline.glow{text-shadow:0 0 5px #fff;box-shadow:none}.maurCTA:not(.underline):hover{color:#fff;background:#000;border-color:#000;transition:.4s}.maurCTA:not(.underline).reverse:hover{color:#000;background:#fff;border-color:#fff;transition:.4s}.maurCTA:not(.underline).fill.shadow:hover,.maurCTA:not(.underline).shadow:hover{text-shadow:none;box-shadow:none;box-shadow:0 0 10px #000;transition:.4s}.maurCTA:not(.underline).fill.glow:hover,.maurCTA:not(.underline).glow:hover{text-shadow:none;box-shadow:none;box-shadow:0 0 10px #fff;transition:.4s}.maurCTA.underline{margin:0;padding:0;border:none}.maurCTAbox:not([class*=inline]) :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA.underline{margin:10% 0 0 0}.maurCTAbox[class*=inline] :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA.underline{margin-left:1em}.maurCTA.underline:after{margin:0 0 -.1em 0;content:"";border:none;position:absolute;border-bottom:1px solid;left:0;right:0;bottom:0}.maurCTA.underline:hover:after{margin:0 0 -.15em 0;border-bottom:3px solid}@media only screen and (min-width:721px) and (max-width:1023px){.maurCTA{padding:10px 40px;font-size:18px}.maurCTAbox :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA{margin-top:20px}.maurCTAbox.inline :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA:not(.underline),.maurCTAbox.inline_m :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA:not(.underline){margin-left:1em}.maurCTAbox:not([class*=inline]) :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA.underline{margin:20px 0 0 0}.maurCTAbox[class*=inline] :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA.underline{margin:0 0 0 1em}.maurCTA.underline:after{margin:0 0 -1px 0}.maurCTA.underline:hover:after{margin:0 0 -2px 0}}@media only screen and (min-width:721px) and (max-width:1023px) and (orientation:landscape){.maurCTAbox.center_d{top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.maurCTAbox.center_h_d{left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,0)}.maurCTAbox.center_v_d{top:50%;transform:translate(0,-50%)}.maurCTA{padding:10px 40px;font-size:18px}.maurCTAbox :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA{margin-top:20px}.maurCTAbox.inline :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA:not(.underline){margin-left:1em}.maurCTAbox:not([class*=inline]) :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA.underline{margin:20px 0 0 0}.maurCTAbox[class*=inline] :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA.underline{margin:0 0 0 1em}.maurCTA.underline:after{margin:0 0 -1px 0}.maurCTA.underline:hover:after{margin:0 0 -2px 0}}@media only screen and (min-width:1024px){.maurCTAbox.center_d{top:50%!important;left:50%!important;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.maurCTAbox.center_h_m{left:0;transform:translate(0)}.maurCTAbox.center_h_d{left:50%!important;transform:translate(-50%,0)}.maurCTAbox.center_v_m{top:0;transform:translate(0)}.maurCTAbox.center_v_d{top:50%!important;transform:translate(0,-50%)}.maurCTA{padding:10px 40px;font-size:18px}.maurCTAbox :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA{margin-top:20px}.maurCTAbox.inline :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA:not(.underline),.maurCTAbox.inline_d :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA:not(.underline){margin-left:1em}.maurCTAbox.inline_d .maurCTA{display:inline-block}.maurCTAbox.inline_m .maurCTA{display:block}.maurCTAbox.inline_m :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA:not(.underline){margin-left:0}.maurCTAbox:not([class*=inline]) :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA.underline{margin:20px 0 0 0}.maurCTAbox[class*=inline] :nth-of-type(n+2) .maurCTA.underline{margin:0 0 0 20px}.maurCTA.underline:after{margin:0 0 -1px 0}.maurCTA.underline:hover:after{margin:0 0 -2px 0}}
</style>

<style type="text/css">
/* maurices home page v4.0.5 112420 pz */
#hpMain{width:100%;max-width:720px;margin:0 auto;padding:0;position:relative;line-height:normal;box-sizing:border-box}#hpMain *,#hpMain :after,#hpMain :before{box-sizing:inherit}#hpMain *{line-height:normal;letter-spacing:normal}.hpSection{width:100%;margin:0 auto;padding:0}.hpSection:not(:last-of-type){padding-bottom:2%}.hpSection.noPad{padding-bottom:0}.hpSpot{width:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative}[class*=hpGrid],[class*=hpInline]:not([class*=hpInline_d]){display:flex}.hpSpotImage{width:100%;margin:0;padding:0;position:relative}.hpSection img,.hpSpot img,.hpSpotImage img{width:100%;margin:0;padding:0;display:block}.hpSection.mobileSwap{display:table;caption-side:bottom}.hpSpot.swapThis{display:table-caption}.hpTextBox{width:auto;margin:0;padding:0;pointer-events:none;position:absolute}.hpTextBox.center,.hpTextBox.center_m{top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.hpTextBox.center_h,.hpTextBox.center_h_m{left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,0)}.hpTextBox.center_v,.hpTextBox.center_v_m{top:50%;transform:translate(0,-50%)}.hpText{width:auto;margin:0 auto;padding:0;pointer-events:none;color:#fff}.hpText.shadow{text-shadow:0 0 5px #000,0 0 20px #000}.hpText.glow{text-shadow:0 0 5px #fff,0 0 20px #fff}.hpText a{pointer-events:auto}.hpText.finePrint{font-size:2.5vw}.hpSection img.center,.hpSection.center,.hpSpot img.center,.hpSpot.center,.hpText.center{margin:0 auto;text-align:center}@media only screen and (min-width:721px) and (max-width:1023px) and (orientation:landscape){#hpMain{width:720px}.hpSection.hpGrid{display:table}.hpSection.hpGrid .hpSpot{width:auto;display:table-cell}.hpTextBox.center_d{top:50%;left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.hpTextBox.center_h_d{left:50%;transform:translate(-50%,0)}.hpTextBox.center_v_d{top:50%;transform:translate(0,-50%)}.hpText.finePrint{font-size:16px}}@media only screen and (min-width:1024px){#hpMain{max-width:960px}.hpSpot{width:auto}[class*=hpGrid],[class*=hpInline]:not([class*=hpInline_m]){display:flex}.hpSpot.hpGrid,.hpSpot.hpGrid-d{display:flex}.hpSpot.hpGrid .hpSpot,.hpSpot.hpGrid .hpSpotImage,.hpSpot.hpGrid-d .hpSpot,.hpSpot.hpGrid-d .hpSpotImage{display:flex}.hpSpot.swapThis{display:table}.maurCTAbox.center_d{top:50%!important;left:50%!important;transform:translate(-50%,-50%)}.hpTextBox.center_h_m{left:0;transform:translate(0)}.hpTextBox.center_h_d{left:50%!important;transform:translate(-50%,0)}.hpTextBox.center_v_m{top:0;transform:translate(0)}.hpTextBox.center_v_d{top:50%!important;transform:translate(0,-50%)}.hpText.finePrint{font-size:14px}}
</style>

contents.name: Footer CSS Styles
contents.freeFormContent:
<style>
    .prefooter-flex {
        display: flex;
        flex-flow: row nowrap;
    }
    .prefooter-flex > div:first-child {
        margin-right: 4%;
    }
    .footer-redesign {
        padding: 15px 5% 10px !important;
    }
    .footer-legal {
        padding: 15px 5% 10px !important;
    }
    .footer-redesign ul {
        list-style-type: none;
    }
    .footer-redesign .one-third {
        width: 20%;
    }
    footer.asc-footer.mar-footer .mar-grid-container {
        max-width: 100% !important;
    }
    .mar-footer .mar-footer-links {
        padding: 5%;
    }
    .footer-redesign .one-third svg:not(:root) {
        /* padding-right: 8px; */
        vertical-align: sub;
    }
    .footer-redesign .one-third .quicklinks li {
        font-weight: 600;
        padding: 8.5px 0%;
    }
    .footer-redesign .one-third .quicklinks li:first-child {
        padding-top: 0;
    }
    .mar-footer .asc-footer-label {
        font-size: 12px;
        text-transform: initial;
    }
    .sign-up {
        display: block;
        font-family: HelveticaNeueW01-65Medi, Helvetica-Neue-Bold, Arial, Lucida Grande, sans-serif;
        padding-bottom: 5px;
    }
    .exclusive {
        display: inline;
    }
    .exclusive>span {
        padding-left: 4px;
        text-decoration: underline;
    }
    .soft--top {
        padding-top: 0px !important;
    }
    .mar-footer .mar-footer-links ul.nav {
        padding-top: 5px;
    }
    .mar-footer-social svg:not(:root) {
        padding-right: 0px !important;
        margin-right: -8px;
    }
    #maur-footer-blog-link>div {
        height: 90%;
        width: 100%;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: center;
    }
    .footer-redesign .hr,
    .footer-redesign hr {
        margin: 0px 7px 2px -16px;
        height: 20px;
        border-top: 1px solid #eee;
        border-style: inset;
        border-width: 0.5px;
    }
    .footer-redesign h4 {
        font-weight: 600;
    }
    .ftr-inline {
        width: 49%;
        display: inline-block;
    }
    svg+a {
        padding-left: 8px;
    }
    .prefooter {
        width: 100%;
        height: auto;
        min-height: 150px;
        background-color: #f6f8f8;
    }
    .hide-on-mobile,
    .hide-on-desktop {
        display: none !important;
    }
    .prefooter .one-third {
        width: 33.333%;
        height: auto;
        background-color: #f6f8f8;
        padding: 3% 6%;
    }
    .prefooter svg:not(:root) {
        /*float: left;*/
        /*margin-right: 4%;*/
    }
    .prefooter p {
        margin: 0;
        margin-bottom: 1%;
    }
    .prefooter-head {
        font-weight: 900;
        color: #000;
        font-size: 13px;
    }
    .prefooter div>a {
        text-decoration: underline;
        margin-right: 3%;
    }
    .privacyPolicy.mar-fav-store-loc,
    a.privacyPolicy {
        color: #55bab7;
    }
    .quicklinks a,
    .mar-footer .asc-footer-label,
    .sign-up,
    .prefooter-head {
        font-size: 14px;
    }
    .mar-footer .mar-footer-links ul.nav,
    .exclusive {
        font-size: 14px;
    }
    @media only screen and (max-width: 767px) {
        .prefooter-flex {
            justify-content: center;
        }
        .mar-footer .mar-footer-links {
            padding: 15px 5% 10px !important;
        }
        .mar-footer .one-dropdown li {
            padding-bottom: 10px;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-dropdown ul.nav {
            padding-top: 5px;
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-third {
            display: block;
            width: 100% !important;
            position: relative;
            border-bottom: 1px solid #8e8e90;
            padding: 10px 15px;
            text-align: center;
        }
        .hide-mobile {
            display: none !important;
        }
        .hide-desktop {
            display: block !important;
        }
        .mar-footer .mar-footer-links.xs-one-whole {
            margin-bottom: 20px !important;
        }
        .footer-redesign .nav.nav--stacked li {
            display: none;
        }
        .footer-redesign .toggleExpand .nav.nav--stacked li {
            display: block;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-third.toggleExpand {
            background-color: #f6f8f8 !important;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-dropdown .asc-footer-label:after {
            content: "\02C5" !important;
            font-family: mar-icon-font;
            position: absolute;
            right: 0;
            top: 0;
            font-size: 10px;
            padding: 11px 15px;
            font-weight: bolder;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-dropdown.toggleExpand .asc-footer-label:after {
            content: "\02C4" !important;
            font-family: mar-icon-font;
            position: absolute;
            right: 0;
            top: 0;
            font-size: 10px;
            padding: 11px 15px;
            font-weight: bolder;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-third .quicklinks li {
            display: inline-block;
            width: 49%;
            padding: 0%;
            text-align: center;
            font-weight: 600;
            padding-bottom: 20px;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-third svg:not(:root) {
            display: block;
            margin: auto;
            padding-bottom: 10px;
            padding-right: 0px;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-third .contact svg:not(:root) {
            display: inline;
            vertical-align: middle;
            padding-bottom: 0px;
        }
        .ftr-legal hr {
            margin: 0px;
            height: 20px;
            border-top: 1px solid #eee;
            border-width: 1px;
            display: inline;
        }
        .footer-copyright {
            background: #F6F8F8;
        }
        .prefooter .one-third {
            width: 100%;
            padding: 5% 14%;
        }
    }
    @media only screen and (min-width:768px) {
        .mar-footer .mar-footer-links .quicklinks li {
            font-weight: 600;
            padding: 8.5px 0%;
        }
        .bottom {
            width: auto !important;
        }
        .footer-copyright {
            display: none;
        }
        .mar-footer .mar-footer-links .quicklinks li:first-child {
            padding-top: 0px;
        }
        #maur-footer-blog-link>div {
            margin-left: -28px;
        }
        a#maur-footer-blog-link img {
            padding-top: 0px !important;
            margin-bottom: 0px !important;
        }
        .mar-footer .mar-footer-social {
            padding-top: 0px;
            margin-left: 0px;
            margin-top: 25px
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-third ul.nav {
            padding-top: 5px;
            width: 200px;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-third li {
            font-size: 14px;
            padding-bottom: 5px;
        }
        .mar-footer-social svg:not(:root) {
            margin-right: -12px;
        }
        #maur-footer-blog-link>div {
            justify-content: left;
        }
        .hide-desktop {
            display: none !important;
        }
        .hide-mobile {
            display: block !important;
            padding: 0 0 35px !important;
        }
    }
    @media only screen and (min-width:768px) and (max-width: 1023px) {
        .prefooter .one-third {
            padding: 4% 2%;
        }
        svg+a {
            padding-left: 2px;
        }
        .grid__item {
            padding-left: 0px;
        }
    }
    @media only screen and (min-width:1024px) {
        .mar-footer-social svg:not(:root) {
            margin-right: -6px;
        }
        .prefooter {
            display: flex;
            flex-flow: row nowrap;
        }
        .footer-redesign {
            display: flex;
            flex-flow: row nowrap;
        }
        .mar-footer .grid__item {
            float: none;
        }
    }
    @media only screen and (min-width:1800px) {
        .footer-redesign {
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        .mar-footer .asc-footer-label {
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        .footer-redesign p {
            font-size: 14px;
        }
        .footer-redesign .one-third img {
            width: 180px !important;
            height: 80px !important;
        }
        .footer-redesign h4 {
            font-size: 16px;
        }
    }
</style>

endeca:auditInfo.ecr:resourcePath: /content/Shared/Page Footer/New Endeca Page Footer - Nov 2020 - Live Chat Quiq Update

contents.name: Footer JS
contents.freeFormContent:
<script>
    if(window.screen.width < 768) {
        var footerDropdowns = document.querySelectorAll('.footer-redesign .one-dropdown');
        footerDropdowns.forEach(function(dropdown) {
            dropdown.addEventListener('click', function() {
                this.style.background = '#FFF';
                this.classList.toggle('toggleExpand');
            });
        });
    }
</script>

FooterContent.name: Mobile Menu Defect Workaround
FooterContent.freeFormContent:
<!-- Mobile Menu Defect Workaround v1.2 040519 -->
<script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
var $categoryLevel = $(".category-level");
if($categoryLevel.children(".active").length === 0)
{ $categoryLevel.removeClass("category-level"); }
});
</script>
